participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, John often feels a sense of loss and seeks solace in online activities.
participant_1.background: i work at a nursing home. i am overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i don't believe in god.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and optimistic, Lisa is passionate about her career and enjoys sharing her life experiences.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park. i'm now looking for a new job.

content.text: I like country music, i like all kinds. Do you believe in god?
I am a retired nurse. Are you overweight and unhappy?
I am doing well. Just got done with my girlfriend.
